cons <- function(car, cdr) list(car = car, cdr = cdr)
lst_length <- function(lst) {
  len <- 0
  while (!is.null(lst)) {
    lst <- lst$cdr
    len <- len + 1
  }
  len
}
lst_to_list <- function(lst) {
  v <- vector(mode = "list", length = lst_length(lst))
  index <- 1
  while (!is.null(lst)) {
    v[[index]] <- lst$car
    lst <- lst$cdr
    index <- index + 1
  }
  v
}
